prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek yellow body and a mysterious aura.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon that uses telekinesis and has a humanoid shape.
Generate a Pokemon that has two spoons and a bright yellow color scheme.
Show me a creature that excels in strategy and has a bipedal stance.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and displays a keen intellect.
Make a Pokemon that is known for its speed and has psychic abilities.
Give me a detailed description of a Pokemon that evolves from Kadabra.
